definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: And salt and Glauber's salt mainly constitute of dissolving salts.
sentences.chinese: 其中易溶盐的主要成分是石盐和芒硝。

sentences.english: Stirring soluble in water, but after the first wet with ethanol by adding water.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌下易溶于水，也可先用乙醇湿润后在加入水中。

sentences.english: Difficult to dissolve in water, soluble in dilute hydrochloric acid and nitric acid, in the air and stability.
sentences.chinese: 难溶于水，易溶于稀盐酸和硝酸，在空气中稳定。

sentences.english: It is deliquescent and soluble in water, forming a strongly alkaline solution.
sentences.chinese: 氨非常易溶于在水，生成弱碱性溶液。

sentences.english: The product dissolves easily in water and its aqueous solution alkaline. It has good cohesive force.
sentences.chinese: 易溶于水，水溶液呈碱性，有很好的粘结力。

sentences.english: This product is white powder. Not dissolved in water, dissolved easily in acid.
sentences.chinese: 本产品呈白色粉末，不溶于水，易溶于酸。

sentences.english: Dark blue columnar crystal, easy dissolving in water or alchol, its solution is acidity.
sentences.chinese: 深兰色柱状结晶，易溶于水和乙醇，其溶液呈酸性。

sentences.english: Ammonia is very soluble in water, forming a weak alkaline solution.
sentences.chinese: 氨非常易溶于在水，生成弱碱性溶液。
